name: Umais Muhammad Siddiqui
label: AI Engineer Portfolio
summary: AI Engineer with expertise in machine learning, NLP, and LLMs. Experienced in data pipelines, RAG techniques, and deploying AI applications using Streamlit and Render.

work_experience.summary: Developed a prototype AI agent using LLMs and vector databases, implementing RAG techniques for context-aware medical report explanations.
highlights: Designed and implemented RAG pipeline for medical report explanations.
Integrated LLMs and vector databases to improve contextual accuracy.
Enhanced AI agent's ability to provide detailed and accurate responses.

work_experience.summary: Contributed to developing AI workflows for enhanced learning experiences using OCR and RAG techniques.
highlights: Leveraged OCR and RAG for better educational content access.
Developed AI-driven solutions to improve student engagement.
Streamlined content retrieval using vector databases.

projects.title: AI Chatbot for Climate Research
projects.summary: Developed a climate-focused chatbot using LangChain, GPT-4, and Whisper with RAG-based responses.
highlights: Integrated 20+ books and 100+ podcasts into Pinecone Vector DB.
Implemented cloud-based pipeline for seamless data ingestion.
Deployed on Streamlit Cloud for organized knowledge retrieval.

projects.title: Mobile Price Range Classifier
projects.summary: Improved model accuracy by 20% through feature engineering, achieving 95% accuracy using SVC.
highlights: Implemented feature engineering for better model accuracy.
Trained using SVC and compared multiple models.
Achieved 95% accuracy in price range classification.

projects.title: Recommender Chatbot
projects.summary: Built a chatbot using LangChain and Llama 3 for humanlike recommendations from a vector database of 15,000+ app descriptions.
highlights: Created a vector database using 15,000+ app descriptions.
Implemented LangChain for RAG-based recommendations.
Designed for humanlike conversational recommendations.

certificates.title: Complete Generative AI Course With Langchain and Huggingface - Udemy
highlights: Gained hands-on experience with LangChain and Huggingface.
Built, deployed, and optimized AI models.
Created 10+ projects including chatbots and content generators.

certificates.title: Google Data Analytics - Coursera
highlights: Learned data cleaning, analysis, and visualization using SQL, R, and Tableau.
Completed practical project-based training.

references.name: Person One
references.reference: Umais showed exceptional problem-solving skills and a deep understanding of AI workflows, delivering high-quality solutions.

references.name: Person Two
references.reference: Umais was highly collaborative and instrumental in improving AI-based projects, contributing innovative ideas and expertise.
